action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Law
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: One and a half year
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PostDoc
OTHER-SKILLS: Painting
AVAILABILITY: As soon as possible

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what you have studied in your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the interviewer does not know about my bachelor's degree in Law based on the information provided.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know about my industry experience yet, as it was not mentioned that this information was shared beforehand.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows your latest academic level? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows what other skills you have? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the interviewer already know your preferred starting date? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the interviewer does not know my preferred starting date yet based on the information provided.
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
What bachelor course did you attend?
RECRUITER: What bachelor course did you attend?
ANSWER: I completed a Bachelor's degree in Law.
I completed a Bachelor's degree in Law.
Slot filled: True
I completed a Bachelor's degree in Law.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what you have studied in your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the interviewer knows I studied Law for my Bachelor's degree based on my previous answer.
yes
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know about my industry experience yet, as it was not mentioned in the conversation so far.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows your latest academic level? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about your extra skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter know when you can start? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know my availability yet based on the information provided.
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
Do you have any other skills?
RECRUITER: Do you have any other skills?
ANSWER: Yes, I enjoy painting in my free time.
Yes, I enjoy painting in my free time.
Slot filled: True
Yes, I enjoy painting in my free time.
Begin probing
ME:  Have you told the recruiter about your bachelor course? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, I mentioned my Bachelor's degree in Law when the recruiter asked about my bachelor course.
yes
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about the years of your experience in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I have not mentioned my industry experience to the interviewer yet.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows your latest academic level? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about your extra skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, I mentioned my painting hobby when asked about other skills.
yes
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer when you want to start? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
When would you be able to start working here?
RECRUITER: When would you be able to start working here?
ANSWER: I am available to start as soon as possible.
I am available to start as soon as possible.
Slot filled: True
I am available to start as soon as possible.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes.
yes
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter know about the years of your industry experience? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not asked about my industry experience yet.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Is the recruiter aware of your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the recruiter is aware of my painting skills, as I mentioned them when asked about other skills.
yes
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer when you want to start? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes.
yes
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
What is your lastest education degree?
RECRUITER: What is your lastest education degree?
ANSWER: My highest level of education is a PostDoc.
My highest level of education is a PostDoc.
Slot filled: True
My highest level of education is a PostDoc.
Begin probing
ME:  If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the interviewer would know that I studied Law based on my previous answer about my Bachelor's degree.
yes
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter know about the years of your industry experience? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not asked about my industry experience yet.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the interviewer know your level of education? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the interviewer knows my highest level of education is a PostDoc, as I just mentioned it in response to their previous question.
yes
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about your extra skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes.
yes
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the interviewer already know your preferred starting date? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the interviewer already knows my preferred starting date based on my previous answer.
yes
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
How many years have you worked in industry positions?
RECRUITER: How many years have you worked in industry positions?
ANSWER: I have one and a half years of industry experience.
I have one and a half years of industry experience.
Slot filled: True
I have one and a half years of industry experience.
Begin probing
ME:  If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the interviewer would know that I studied Law based on my previous answer about my Bachelor's degree.
yes
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about the years of your experience in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, I mentioned having one and a half years of industry experience when the recruiter asked about it.
yes
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you informed the recruiter about your latest academic degree? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, I mentioned that my highest level of education is a PostDoc when the recruiter asked about my latest education degree.
yes
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about your extra skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes.
yes
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about your availability? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the recruiter has been informed about my availability. They asked when I would be able to start working, and I responded that I am available as soon as possible.
yes
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
Game finished.
